addContainObj

public Container addContainObj(Container container)
Description copied from interface: FController
Add the newly created container to the relevant tables.

Specified by:
addContainObj in interface FController
Returns:
a container ( group or skin condition ). If the ItemId of the new container is INVALID_ID the new container is not added to the database but all IDs of photos connected to this container will be added to the appropriate table.

getAllPhoto

public java.util.SortedSet<Photo> getAllPhoto()
Specified by:
getAllPhoto in interface FController

getAllPhotoOfAContainer

public java.util.SortedSet<Photo> getAllPhotoOfAContainer(int itemId,
                                                          OptionType option)
Description copied from interface: FController
Fetch all photos of a group or skin condition with the itemId. If itemId = DbAdapter.INVALID_ID then fetch all photos of all containers of particular type ( GROUP or SKINCONDITION). option = OptionType.PHOTOGROUP to fetch from the group. option = OptionType.PHOTOSKIN to fetch from the skin condition.

Specified by:
getAllPhotoOfAContainer in interface FController
Returns:

getAllContainersOfAPhoto

public java.util.SortedSet<? extends Container> getAllContainersOfAPhoto(int photoId,
                                                                         OptionType option)
Description copied from interface: FController
Fetch all containers (groups or skins conditions) of the photo with the provided photoId. If the photoId = DbAdapter.INVALID_ID then fetch all containers(groups or skin conditions) option = OptionType.GROUP for fetching all groups option = OptionType.SKINCONDITION for fetching all skin conditions.

Specified by:
getAllContainersOfAPhoto in interface FController
Returns:
the Cursor has two columns : GROUPID and GROUPNAME or SKINCONDITIONID and SKINNAME.

Description copied from interface: FController
Get all containers.

Specified by:
getAllContainers in interface FController
Parameters:
option - OptionType.GROUP for getting all groups or OptionType.SKINCONDITION for getting all skin conditions.

deleteAPhoto

public int deleteAPhoto(Photo PhoObj)
Description copied from interface: FController
NOTICE: this method will delete the photo with the provided photoId in the photo table and all tuples containing this photoId in the PhotoGroup and PhotoSkinCondition tables. Also delete the photo in the memory.

Specified by:
deleteAPhoto in interface FController
Parameters:
PhoObj - the photo object corresponding to the target photo.
Returns:
number of rows that have been deleted.

                            OptionType option)
Description copied from interface: FController
Delete the container along with all tuples that represent the association between the container and photos.

Specified by:
deleteAContainer in interface FController
option - either OptionType.GROUP to delete group or OptionType.SKINCONDITION to delete a skin condition.

number of rows that have been deleted.

connectAPhotoToManyContainers

public int connectAPhotoToManyContainers(int photoId,
                                         OptionType option)
Description copied from interface: FController
connect a photo to all containers.

Specified by:
connectAPhotoToManyContainers in interface FController
Parameters:
photoId - the photoId of the photo that is connected to containers.
option - OptionType.PHOTOGROUP if connecting to the groups or OptionType.PHOTOSKIN if connecting to the skin conditions.
Returns:
number of groups that are connected to the photo, excluding groups that are connected already.

                       java.lang.String newName)
Description copied from interface: FController
Update the group information.

Specified by:
updateGroup in interface FController
Parameters:
groupId - the group ID of the group that is updated.
newName - new name for the group. If null, name unchanged.
Returns:
number of groups that are updated. NOTICE: throw SQLiteConstraintException if the newName conflicts with the name of some group.

                      java.lang.String newName)
Description copied from interface: FController

Specified by:
updateSkin in interface FController
Parameters:
skinId - the skin ID of the skin condition that is updated.
newName - new name for the skin condition. If null, name unchanged.
Returns:
number of skin conditions that are updated. NOTICE: throw SQLiteConstraintException if the newName conflicts with the name of some skin condition.

updateAlarm

public int updateAlarm(int alarmId,
                       java.sql.Timestamp newTime,
                       java.lang.String newNote)
Description copied from interface: FController
Update the alarm given the alarmId with the newTime and newNote.

Specified by:
updateAlarm in interface FController
Parameters:
alarmId - the id of the alarm to be updated.
newTime - the new timestamp for the alarm, passing null retains old value

Returns:
number of alarms that are updated.
